query: SELECT [ID], [MUID], [VersionName], [VersionNumber], [Version_ID], [VersionFlag], [Name], [Code], [ChangeTrackingMask], [Company], [Local Location Code] AS [Local_Location_Code], [Group Location Code_Code] AS [Group_Location_Code_Code], [Group Location Code_Name] AS [Group_Location_Code_Name], [Group Location Code_ID] AS [Group_Location_Code_ID], [EnterDateTime], [EnterUserName], [EnterVersionNumber], [LastChgDateTime], [LastChgUserName], [LastChgVersionNumber], [ValidationStatus] FROM [MDS].[mdm].[Location Affiliates Mapping]
